    • Field Detail

      • THRESHOLD

        protected static double THRESHOLD

      • regex

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern regex
        The MovingPlatform string is as follows: {'axis' 'direction' 'speed'} where axis is one of the following:
        h, horiz, horizontal, v, vert, or vertical
        In all six cases the first letter may be capitalized. The direction is one of the following if the axis is horizontal (or h or horiz):
        r, rt, right, l, lt, or left
        Once again the first letter may be capitalized. If the axis is vertical the direction may be:
        u, up, d, dn, or down
        The speed is a decimal number greater than or equal to 0.

      • direction

        protected platforms.MovingPlatform.Direction direction
        The direction the platform is traveling.
        See Also:
        Direction

      • speed

        protected double speed
        The speed the the platform will travel at. Units: (logical grid spaces)/second, not pixels. One logical grid space = Platform.PLATFORM_WIDTH or Platform.PLATFORM_HEIGHT

      • makePlatform

        public Platform makePlatform(java.lang.String str,
                    java.lang.Integer x,
                    java.lang.Integer y)
        Creates a MovingPlatform as specified by str.
        Specified by:
        makePlatform in class Platform
        Parameters:
        str - the String to be parsed, it will match regex.
        x - the location that the token occurred in the level file.
        y - the location that the token occurred in the level file.
        Returns:
        the new platform.
        See Also:
        Platform.makePlatform(java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer), speed

      • isCollidingWith

        public boolean isCollidingWith(Platform p)
        Returns if this should react to a collision with p. Firstly if there is no overlap, then the method returns false. Then if the collision is on the leading edge of the platform, it returns true. Always returns false if p is not tangible.
        Overrides:
        isCollidingWith in class Platform
        Parameters:
        p - the platform that may be colliding with this
        Returns:
        true if they intersect in a way that would illicit a reaction from this Platform.
        See Also:
        Platform.isCollidingWith(Platform)

      • leftBlocked

        protected Platform leftBlocked(Level level)
        Determines if the MovintPlatform can move left, based solely upon the positions of other platforms.
        Parameters:
        level - the level that the MovingPlatform is in.
        Returns:
        the platform that is in the way, null if there is no blockage.

          Level level)
        Updates the MovingPlatform by first updating it's direction and then updating it's position.
        Specified by:
